name: Wild Hunter Field 3D
description:
Wild Hunter Field 3D is a brand new real hunting and sniper shooting experience which you might not been able to get in your real life. Those who cannot risk their life hunting wild animals can enjoy real hunting experience by playing this game.
FEATURES
- An ultimate hunting action.
- Gameplay is simple yet entertaining.
- Efficient gun control.
- True to life hunting experience.
- High fidelity cool graphics.
